summary:
Introduces craftable arrows at the smithing forge, imbued with magical properties.
Contains 10 different magical arrows craftable to iron, glass, ebony and daedric metals.
descriptionHtml:
A mod that introduces arrows imbued with magical properties.
All arrows are craftable at the Smithing Forge.


=============
Arrows
=============
Ice Arrow - A shard of Ice that is unaffected by gravity. Will fly indefinitely.
Fire Arrow - An arrow lit with the Flame of destruction. Burn them.
Flash Arrow - A Flash arrow that hits its target instantly. Zero flight time.
Lightning Arrow - An arc of Lightning unaffeected by gravity. Will fly indefinitely.
Chicken Arrow - A Demon Chicken hell bent on destruction smites the foes that stand against you. Claws of steel.
Hawk Arrow - A kamikaze Hawk. Selfless.

Special Arrows:
Infernal Arrow - Burn them all.
Storm Arrow - Execution by electrocution.
Cold Snap Arrow - Freeze their blood.
Gust Arrow - Blow their house down.


=============
Recipes:
=============
Metal: Require relating smithing perk, excluding Iron
Iron - 2 Firewood, 2 Iron Ingot
Glass - 2 Firewood, 1 Refined Malachite, 1 Refined Moonstone
Ebony - 2 Firewood, 2 Ebony Ingot
Daedric - 2 Firewood, 1 Ebony Ingot, 1 Daedra Heart
Misc - 2 Firewood, 2 Dwarven Metal Ingot


Basic: 100 Arrows
Ice - 1 Frost Salt
Fire - 1 Fire Salt
Lightning - 1 Void Salt
Flash - 1 Salt Pile
Chicken - 1 Chicken Egg
Hawk - 1 Hawk Feather

Special: 20 Arrows
Inferno - 1 Fire Salt, 1 Fireball Scroll
Cold Snap - 1 Frost Salt, 1 Ice Storm Scroll
Storm - 1 Void Salt, 1 Chain Lightning Scroll
Gust - 1 Fear Scroll, 1 Frenzy Scroll

=============
Version History
=============
v0.01 - Ice & Flash arrows added
v0.02 - Gust arrow added
v0.03 - Lightning arrow added
v0.04 - Chicken arrow added
v1.00 - Introduced arrow recipes, craftable at the Smithing Forge
v1.10 - Craftable Glass, Ebony and Daedric Arrows
v1.20 - Fire arrow added, improved arrow recipes
v1.50 - Special trio arrows added
v1.51 - Gust arrow dissapation fix
v1.52 - Hawk arrow added
v1.60 - Base metal iron added, does not need any smithing levels or perks
v1.61 - Reworked gust arrow, moved into \'special\' category

---------------------

A special thank-you to ACE for providing some excellent ideas !
author: Lexyrex
